mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movies (title, release_date, director, cast, rating, duration, plot, count) VALUES (#{title}, #{release_date}, #{director}, #{cast}, #{rating}, #{duration}, #{plot}, #{count})
mapper.update: UPDATE movies SET title = #{title}, release_date = #{release_date}, director = #{director}, cast = #{cast}, rating = #{rating}, duration = #{duration}, plot = #{plot}, count = #{count} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, release_date, director, cast, rating, duration, plot, count FROM movies
